alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 8:51PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Buchanan, Benton and western Linn Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 850 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waterloo Municipal Airport to near Tama. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Keystone around 910 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fairbank, Van Horne, Garrison, Vinton, Shellsburg and Urbana. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 39 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
